--------------------
Text: Florence Virginia Foose Wilson Mayberry:  In the religion, her service as a speaker was wide-ranging, and soon she advanced from position to position in the religion as first an Auxiliary Board member and then a Continental Counselor and then one serving at the International Teaching Centre - the highest appointed positions of the religion during her later years.
